website_summaries.verdict: The longest-lasting spray, offering 24 hours of fixative.
pros: Very fine, lightweight micro-mist that locks in makeup and prevents smudges
Makes skin look refreshed and dewy
cons: Some found it worked better with liquid makeup rather than powder, which it didn’t set as well

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Works well for baking and setting. I use it with the lock it foundation and It stays on all day. Hopefully her products reduce in price now that she is a racist lol I’d enjoy that. Also if you are worried about fake products, which you should be since they are very rampant...normally I would say buy direct from her website, however I took a shot and purchased this spray on amazon instead and the box came sealed, identical to the other products I’ve ordered from kvd beauty. It’s real, but DO NOT Buy her setting powder From amazon its TOTALLY FAKE.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: LASTS FOR HOURS!! DRYS FAST!! NOT STICKY!!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't even know or ever heard of setting spray until I watched this new Reality TV show called Glam Masters. I saw this being used and thought it was a wonderful idea. After doing research, I bought this product because I use Kat Von D's Powder Foundation and although very expensive, I found heaven when I used it, I trusted the brand. This setting spray was incredible!! I didn't trust it at first because it's counter-intuitive to spray a liquid in a dry, powdered face, but it really WORKS!! I didn't get oily the whole night. It's a definite GO for me!!
customer_reviews.author: abuyco

customer_reviews.title: repeat customer
customer_reviews.text: I got this product the first time very quickly. it works so well. I use it to set me face (as typical) as well as to set shimmer/sparkle eyeshadows by spraying on my brush. Fine mist. Great holding strength. No sticky residue. Looks great on my dewy, semi-matte and soft matte foundations (cream and liquid). I have very dry skin and this product works so well that I bought a second bottle!!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Ybarra

customer_reviews.title: Holds well but very drying
customer_reviews.text: This is a very drying product and really should be noted as for oily skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonfan

customer_reviews.title: The setting mist is very fine and my makeup last over 8 hours
customer_reviews.text: The setting mist is very fine and my makeup last over 8 hours. I do prefer UD but this is a close runner up. The fragrant is very pleasant and not over powering.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great all day setting spray
customer_reviews.text: I bought the trial size first to see if I liked it and the stuff is wonderful when I run out I will be buying the full size! I have to save a little money first LOL!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product works wonderfully. I’ve been using it for over a year ...
customer_reviews.text: This product works wonderfully. I’ve been using it for over a year now. It sets my makeup and my makeup looks the same as well as it did in the morning when I go to take it off at night. Well worth the cost. My bottle lasts 8 months or more.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria White

customer_reviews.title: great product, should be sent in better packaging
customer_reviews.text: I wish this product had come with some kind of packaging other than the bottle with the top. The bottle had some dried spots where you could tell the product had leaked out and had no tamper resist packaging. Other than that the mist is really fine which is wonderful. I have high hopes that it will keep my makeup in place.
customer_reviews.author: Lllljjjjssss

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Works great! The spray does he spotty when the bottle is low.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie L Hamel

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: I was told about this product by a makeup artist. I was a little skeptical but now that I have it it's the best thing ever my makeup looks the same at the end of the day then it did at the start of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Bellevue

customer_reviews.title: No need to reapply your make up with Kat Von D Lock It
customer_reviews.text: My daughter introduced me to “Lock It”. I was pleasantly surprised, this product really works- my make up stays on much longer during the day!
customer_reviews.author: Kat Kupiec

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre
customer_reviews.text: I was hopeful that this would be as amazing as some of her other products, but the setting spray really didn’t do it’s job. Other products that I’ve tried were far better at setting my make up for the day.
customer_reviews.author: Hope Norton

customer_reviews.title: Does not spray well
customer_reviews.text: Does not spray well...it’s like being spat at on the face, hot mess
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the lock it product. You can never go wrong with Kat Von D products
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Rosales

customer_reviews.title: Good but....
customer_reviews.text: Great for eye makeup. Still can't find one that locks my fave makeup on 😣
customer_reviews.author: Ablack10

customer_reviews.title: 💚
customer_reviews.text: Love it ! Truly holds my makeup in place all day
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Omg! I bought this for prom season and it didn't hold up like UD All Nighter! Very disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kawan

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting
customer_reviews.text: Definitely the best spray I've ever used. Lasts a whole day. So worth it!
customer_reviews.author: pilar picone

customer_reviews.title: It is STUCK LIKE GLUE
customer_reviews.text: Love the misting of this product, it's not too wet; perfect application. Withstanding humidity & almost 100 degree temperatures without melting my make up. My skin stay matte, no transfer on clothes or my cell phone. I'll for sure order again!!
customer_reviews.author: Jill E. Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Nothing great here!
customer_reviews.text: Glad I got the trial size. It’s not a bad product but for the price I would expect it to be great. I would have been more disappointed if I got a larger size and spent more money. It does the job fine but also so does my other setting sprays that cost less then this. Over priced!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly T

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves this product. She has been wanting ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this product. She has been wanting it and she raves about how much she lives it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A must have and keep make on and in place
customer_reviews.author: Keisha Massiah

customer_reviews.title: Great product that works!
customer_reviews.text: Love this setting/hold spray. As a makeup artist I need to be sure my clients makeup is long-lasting and sweatproof , this really does what it says.
customer_reviews.author: chana hartstein

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff and my makeup lasts all day.
customer_reviews.author: lauren b

product_meta.title: Kat Von D Lock-It Makeup Setting Mist - 1oz/30ml
product_meta.description: Size:30mlLock-It Makeup Setting Mist has an unstoppable formula with a luxurious, soft mist for an upgraded experience. The advanced misting system features an aerosol-alternative sprayer to deliver the continuous fine mist of an aerosol in an environmentally friendly format. This refreshing, weightless spray keeps your makeup looking fresh and vibrant for a up to 24-hours. Ideal for all skin types, it is powerful enough to lock-in looks yet light enough to wear all day, every day. Skin stays comfortable with a blend of naturally refreshing ingredients and a light cucumber scent for an instant boost. It feels totally undetectable on the skin, with no tightness or sticky residue.
